description: Try our easy to follow Basic Vanilla Ice-Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Basic Vanilla Ice-Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a large spoon or ice-cream scoop, break up mixture and transfer to the large mixing bowl of a stand mixer. Beat for 5 minutes or until smooth and creamy. Add flavour options, if desired. Return to the container and seal. Freeze overnight or until firm.
